hcaptcha-addurl:
Message above the CAPTCHA for addurl (user added new external links to the page) action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-addurl}}
hcaptcha-badlogin:
Message above the CAPTCHA for badlogin action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-badlogin}}
hcaptcha-createaccount-fail:
Error message, when the CAPTCHA isn't solved correctly.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-createaccount-fail}}
hcaptcha-create:
Message above the CAPTCHA for create (user creates a new page) action.
{{related|ConfirmEdit-create}}
hcaptcha-help: Explanation of how to solve the CAPTCHA for API clients.
hcaptcha-privacy-policy: Links to hCaptcha Privacy Policy and Terms of Service to be displayed when the hCaptcha could be shown on an action
hcaptcha-challenge-closed: Error message shown within a form when a user closes the hCaptcha challenge without completing it.
hcaptcha-challenge-expired: Error message shown within a form when a user takes too long to complete the hCaptcha challenge.
hcaptcha-load-error: Error message shown within a form when hCaptcha fails to load.
hcaptcha-rate-limited: Error message shown within a form when hCaptcha serves a rate limit error.
hcaptcha-unknown-error: Error message shown within a form when an unknown error occurs while executing the hCaptcha challenge.
hcaptcha-loading-indicator-label: Hidden label value set for accessibility on the loading indicator shown while the hCaptcha code is initializing.
hcaptcha-missing-token: Error message shown within a form when it is submitted without hCaptcha having been executed.
